name: Drake Bell
politicalViews: He's a Democrat, but not particularly enthusiastic.
author: Caitlin Frye

content.text: Jared Drake Bell, better known as just Drake Bell, was born and raised in Santa Ana, California.
The internet really seems to think Bell is a born-again Christian,
well except for the occasional Jewish label, which is pretty typical of any celebrity ever.
Some even go so far as to say that he wasn't a believer until he went to church with his religious mother, and then he became "born again."

content.sourceTitle: Drake Bell Will Perform Christmas Music At Universal City Walk On November 20, 2012.
content.text: Trouble is, I couldn't find any evidence to back up those claims. The closest I got to any religious affiliation was the fact that he performed some Christmas songs at an event in Los Angeles.
And that's not exactly a devout profession of faith. Even his song "Don't Preach" is entirely secular.
So despite the rumors, I think we'll have to call this young actor non-religious for the time being.

content.sourceTitle: Drake Bell & Michael Corcoran on Josh Peck & Obama Vs Romney at Bootsy at Bootsy Bellows in West Hollywood.
content.text: Drake Bell appears to be a lukewarm Democrat. He gave a possibly slightly drunk endorsement of Obama outside a bar in L.A. prior to the 2012 presidential election.
And then after the election, when asked what he thought about the outcome, he said,

content.sourceTitle: Drake Bell on Obama Win at Bootsy Bellows in LA.

content.text: And then on his Twitter feed,
he retweeted a link to  which criticizes the far-right element of the Republican party.
In terms of non-controversial pseudo-political involvement, Bell is a spokesman for the Thirst Project which aims to increase access to clean drinking water to communities across the globe.

So we'll tentatively call Bell a Democrat for now, although I suspect there's some opinions beneath the surface that he hasn't let out yet. As soon as he starts getting involved in the political debate, let us know in the comments!
